Issue.creator: jyellick
Issue.summary: Remove fixture dependency from etcdraft test (after moving to Go v1.15)
Issue.description: PR https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric/pull/1888 introduced a number of new test fixtures because the tlsgen package was not producing certificates with a valid SKI. It has been verified that with golang v1.15 this generation no longer exhibits the problem. See the comments in the test to convert this task back to generated certificates, rather than fixtures.
